entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
